title: Outside Adult Advice
itunes:title: Outside Adult Advice
description:
Hello everyone my mother 49 and father 50 have been together for twenty one years and married for 18 and for 13 of those years my father has been cheating on my mother. The reason I know this is because ever since I was little when they got into arguments which is often he proudly throws the fact that he has a couple of women on the side in her face and sometimes calls his mother and tells her how stupid my mom is for staying with him when she knows he is cheating on her.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
